summary: This bill, the Chiquita Canyon Tax Relief Act, aims to exclude from gross income certain payments made to victims of the Chiquita Canyon elevated temperature landfill event. It defines the event, specifies eligible recipients (individuals compensated for losses related to the event), and clarifies that payments from government agencies and Waste Connections, Inc., among others, qualify. The provision applies to amounts received on or after March 1, 2024.
